item.title: KSAT stays transfer of Raichur University Registrar Shankareppa Vanikyal
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Karnataka State Administrative Tribunal (KSAT), Bengaluru Bench, has stayed the State government’s order transferring Shankareppa Vanikyal, Registrar (Administration) of Raichur University.
The tribunal passed an interim order on June 19, 2025, in response to a petition filed by Mr. Vanikyal challenging the legality of his transfer.
The government, through a notification dated June 18, 2025, appointed Channappa A., Registrar (Administration) of Karnataka University, Dharwad, in Mr. Vanikya...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: CM will lay foundation stones for various works at a cost of ₹936 crore in Raichur on June 23
item.description:
<![CDATA[Chief Minister will lay foundation stones for various development works at a cost of ₹936 crore it is to mark the decennial celebration of Article 371(J), and he will inaugurate Tribal Utsav in Raichur on June 23, said Basanagouda Daddal, MLA.
He was addressing a joint press conference with MP G. Kumar Naik in Raichur on Friday.
Mr. Daddal said that the cost of the project for which a foundation stone will be laid and the various development works will be inaugurated is ₹936 crore.
“The Chief...]]>
